name: Mirror Jumper
description:
You are a mirror jumper. You have the unique ability to jump between an alternate universe and your universe to traverse obstacles and find hidden routes. Once you start you can't stop running or you will lose control and maybe be trapped in the alternate universe. 

How far will you come?

Jump Drop Collect Mirror Survive CONTROLS ActionKeyboardMouseControllerJumpWLMBA / RBDropSRMBX / LBFullscreenF-SelectPauseESC / P-StartMenu LeftQ-LBMenu RightE-RB CONTACT

If you experience problems, have questions or suggestions please feel free to contact me either on itch or via solobyte.games@gmail.com. I will try to reply a soon as possible.

SUPPORT ME

If you like what you are seeing consider supporting me here on itch or on Ko-Fi.  I really appreciate it and it helps me dedicate more of my time on making games :D
